name: Smappee
0:
”Alexa, ask smappee what is the consumption for today”
”What is the production for yesterday”
”What is the gas usage for this month”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smappee
des:
The Smappee home energy monitor measures the power consumption of your home and shows your energy/gas/water consumption and solar production per day, month, and year in the Smappee app. Thanks to Alexa, you can now ask Smappee for all of this with a simple voice command.

A Smappee home energy monitor is required. Please visit www.smappee.com for more info.
